programme.title: Animal Cops: Houston
programme.desc: A hoarder gets a visit from the SPCA; starving horses are left in a water-logged paddock; an abandoned golden retriever has a mysterious itch.

programme.title: Blood Ivory
programme.desc: The VETPAW team scrambles through red tape while realizing the majesty of Africa and what they came there for; for their first operation, their search for ivory takes them to a remote village belonging to a tribe known to use poisonous arrows.

programme.title: Walking with Elephants
programme.desc: Levison Wood is in Botswana hoping to follow the worlds largest elephant migration for 650 miles on foot along ancient pathways, but he first must overcome dangers in the bush before tracking a large herd of female elephants.
